QuestData.Title: Securing A Future
QuestData.Description: It is rumored that the Thunder King's power comes directly from a hidden source within his palace.$b$bEven when he is defeated a new tyrant, Garrosh perhaps, could still use this magic to a terrible end.$b$bThat is unless we make the first move!$b$bTake my staff into the Pinnacle of Storms. Once Lei Shen has been defeated place my staff in the center of his dais.$b$bWe will drain the rest of his power and make sure it stays in our hands.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the Thunder King within the Pinnacle of Storms and use the Staff of Antonidas to drain the remaining power from his dais.
